message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a product that I believe will be extremely valuable to your business.  I understand this product is worth at least $1,200,000 to you, and I'm willing to offer it to you at a very competitive price.  Let's talk numbers - I'm offering it to you for $1,150,000.  This gives you a significant advantage and allows me to get a great price for my product.  What do you say?
